Hi, I'm Tim.

I'm a web developer living just outside Scranton, PA with my wife and dog. I've been developing web sites and applications for the past 12 years. I have had the privilege to work with some large and small shops such as Solid Cactus, Web.com and FastPivot. I also co-founded two companies, Argyll Studios and Hosted Notes. The latter was successfully acquired in 2013. Recenlty I was working at Plain, the team behind the Barley Editor and Unmark.

Currently I'm a JavaScript instructor at The Iron Yard

Tim Whitacre

December 2, 2010
